header.title: Advanced BBCode Box 3 (aka ABBC3) - Update : This file describes the changes in language files from version 3.0.7 to 3.0.8
header.description: This file describes the changes in language files from version 3.0.7 to 3.0.8 (for custom language translations)
header.author-notes: This file is for users who have translated or edited these language files to something not included in the original MOD package. See the main install file for any additional information about the MOD.

edit.action: 'ABBC3_FUNCTION_DISABLED' => 'This function is not available on this board.', 'ABBC3_AJAX_DISABLED' => 'Your browser does not support AJAX (XMLHttpRequest) and was unable to process this request.', 'ABBC3_SUBMIT' => 'Insert into message', 'ABBC3_SUBMIT_SIG' => 'Insert into signature', 'SAMPLE_TEXT' => 'This is a text sample',

edit.find: * Several lines have an special note like "## For translate : " follow for one or more "yes"

edit.find: 'ABBC3_COLOR_EXPLAIN' => 'Note: Enable the ABBC3 Font colour menu or disable to use the standard phpBB3 Font colour picker.',

'ABBC3_WEB_EXPLAIN' => 'Note: allowing other websites to be inserted in posts, can pose a security risk. Use at your own risk, or assign to trusted groups.', // Image & Thumbnail Wizard 'ABBC3_ALIGN_MODE' => 'Align image', ## For translate : Don't Yes 'ABBC3_ALIGN_SELECTOR' => array( 'none' => 'Default', 'left' => 'Left', 'center' => 'Center', 'right' => 'Right', 'float-left' => 'Float-Left', 'float-right' => 'Float-Right'), // Image

'ABBC3_BBVIDEO_SELECT' => 'Please select a video type', 'ABBC3_BBVIDEO_SELECT_ERROR'=> 'There are no embedded video links currently allowed. Please contact the %sBoard Administrator%s if this problem persists.

// 'ABBCODES_UPLOAD_EXTENSION' => 'Available extensions', // 'ABBCODES_UPLOAD_EXTENSION_EXPLAIN' => 'You can add/change/delete allowed datatypes. Separate extensions with a comma (,)
Note : These values will overwrite the Attachments Manage extensions setings.',
edit.action: 'ABBCODES_VIDEO_ALLOWED' => 'Video types allowed', 'ABBCODES_VIDEO_ALLOWED_EXPLAIN' => 'Select the video sites and/or formats you would like to allow users to embed in their posts when the BBvideo BBcode is enabled (*)', 'ABBCODES_VIDEO_ALLOWED_NOTE' => '(*) In order to select (or deselect) multiple items, you must CTRL+CLICK (or CMD-CLICK on Mac) items to add them. If you forget to hold down CTRL/CMD when clicking an item, then all the previously selected items will be deselected.', 'ABBCODES_COLOUR_MODE' => 'Choose the colour picker mode', ## For translate : Don't Yes 'ABBCODES_COLOUR_SELECTOR' => array( 'phpbb' => 'phpBB style Default', 'dropdown' => 'Drop Down Menu', 'fancy' => '“fancy” selector', 'tigra' => 'Tigra color picker'), 'ABBCODES_WIZARD_MODE' => 'Choose the wizards mode', ## For translate : Don't Yes 'ABBCODES_WIZARD_SELECTOR' => array( '0' => 'Disable wizards', '1' => 'Pop Up window', '2' => 'In post'), 'ABBCODES_UCP_MODE' => 'UCP Control options', 'ABBCODES_UCP_MODE_EXPLAIN' => 'Allow users to select their own editor mode, by choosing between the standard phpBB3 BBcode buttons, ABBC3 “Extended” or ABBC3 “Compact” view.', 'ABBCODES_WIZARD' => 'Wizard', 'ABBCODES_WIZARD_SIZE' => 'Wizard dimensions', 'ABBCODES_WIZARD_SIZE_EXPLAIN' => 'Default width and height for pop-up wizard window.', 'ABBCODES_DESELECT_ALL' => 'Deselect all', 'ABBCODES_SELECT_ALL' => 'Select all',

edit.find:
'ABBCODES_GROUPS_EXPLAIN' => 'Manage groups : If there are no selected groups then all users can use this BBcode.
In order to select (or un-select) multiple groups, you must use Ctrl-Click (or Cmd-Click on Mac) items to add them. If you forget to hold down Ctrl/Cmd when clicking an item, then all the previously selected items will be deselected.',
edit.action:
'ABBCODES_GROUPS_EXPLAIN' => 'Manage groups : If there are no selected groups then all users can use this BBcode.
In order to select (or deselect) multiple groups, you must CTRL+CLICK (or CMD-CLICK on Mac) items to add them. If you forget to hold down CTRL/CMD when clicking an item, then all the previously selected items will be deselected.',

edit.find:
// Installer $lang = array_merge($lang, array( // Main 'INSTALLER_TITLE' => 'Advanced BBcodes Box 3', 'INSTALLER_VERSION' => ' version : %1$s', 'INSTALLER_INTRO' => 'Intro', 'INSTALLER_INTRO_WELCOME' => 'Welcome to the %1$s Installation', 'INSTALLER_INTRO_WELCOME_NOTE' => 'Please choose what you want to do.', 'INSTALLER_INSTALL_MENU' => 'Menu', 'INSTALLER_EXTRA_MENU' => 'Extras', // Install 'INSTALLER_INSTALL' => 'Install', 'INSTALLER_INSTALL_WELCOME' => 'Welcome to the ABBC3 Installation menu', 'INSTALLER_INSTALL_WELCOME_NOTE' => 'When you choose to install ABBC3, any database of previous versions will be dropped.', 'INSTALLER_INSTALL_SUCCESSFUL' => 'Installation of ABBC3 was successful.', 'INSTALLER_INSTALL_UNSUCCESSFUL' => 'Installation of ABBC3 was not successful.', 'INSTALLER_INSTALL_VERSION' => 'Install version : %1$s', 'INSTALLER_INSTALL_END' => 'Installation of %1$s version : %2$s was successful.

You should now login to your board and check if everything is working fine.
Do not forget to delete, rename or move your install_abbc3.php file!

', // Update 'INSTALLER_UPDATE' => 'Update', 'INSTALLER_UPDATE_WELCOME' => 'Welcome to the ABBC3 Update menu', 'INSTALLER_UPDATE_WELCOME_NOTE' => 'When you choose to Update ABBC3, any database of previous versions will be dropped.', 'INSTALLER_UPDATE_SUCCESSFUL' => 'Update of ABBC3 was successful.', 'INSTALLER_UPDATE_UNSUCCESSFUL' => 'Update of ABBC3 was not successful.', 'INSTALLER_UPDATE_VERSION' => 'Update to version : %1$s', 'INSTALLER_UPDATE_END' => 'Please be advised that some BBCodes might not display correctly due to the changes introduced in BBCodes. If you experience problems please run the Extras » Re-parse steps.', // Uninstall 'INSTALLER_DELETE' => 'Delete', 'INSTALLER_DELETE_WELCOME' => 'Welcome to the ABBC3 Delete menu', 'INSTALLER_DELETE_WELCOME_NOTE' => 'When you choose to delete the MOD, we remove all SQL-data insert by the installation.', 'INSTALLER_DELETE_VERSION' => 'Delete version : %1$s', 'INSTALLER_DELETE_NOTE' => 'Delete', 'INSTALLER_DELETE_SUCCESSFUL' => 'Deleted the %1$s version : %2$s was successfully.
Now delete all files.', 'INSTALLER_DELETE_UNSUCCESSFUL' => 'Could not delete %1$s version :%2$s .', // Re-parse 'INSTALLER_REPARSE' => 'Re-parse', 'INSTALLER_REPARSE_WELCOME' => 'Welcome to the Re-parse menu', 'INSTALLER_REPARSE_WELCOME_NOTE' => 'Re-parse simply reparses all BBCodes -- it is useful if you have changed the syntax of a BBCode, and they have stopped working correctly.', 'INSTALLER_REPARSE_NOTE' => 'Please note that while the chance of any database damage is unlikely, you are running it at your own risk and I am not responsible if something goes wrong.', 'INSTALLER_REPARSE_WARNING' => 'You should make a backup of your users, posts and privmsgs tables in case something goes wrong.', 'INSTALLER_REPARSE_POST' => 'Re-parse post content', 'INSTALLER_REPARSE_SIG' => 'Re-parse signatures', 'INSTALLER_REPARSE_PM' => 'Re-parse private messages', 'INSTALLER_REPARSE_SUCCESSFUL' => '%1$s was successful.', 'INSTALLER_REPARSE_UNSUCCESSFUL' => 'Could not %1$s.', 'STEP_PERCENT_COMPLETED' => 'Step %d of %d', 'INSTALLER_NOTE' => 'Note : Before adding this MOD to your forum, you should backup the database and all files related to this MOD!', 'INSTALLER_DELETE_INFORMATION' => 'Could not find ABBC3 installed!', 'INSTALLER_NEEDS_FOUNDER' => 'You must be logged in as a founder.', 'MISSING_PARENT_MODULE' => 'Module #%1$s is missing as a parent module for "%2$s".', 'WARNING' => 'Warning',
edit.action:
// UMIL Installer $lang = array_merge($lang, array( // Main 'INSTALLER_TITLE' => 'Advanced BBcodes Box 3', 'INSTALLER_TITLE_EXPLAIN' => 'Welcome to the ABBC3 Installation menu', 'INSTALLER_INSTALL_WELCOME' => 'When you choose to install ABBC3, any database of previous versions will be dropped.', 'INSTALLER_INSTALL_WELCOME_NOTE' => 'Please be advised that some BBCodes might not display correctly due to the changes introduced in BBCodes.
If you experience problems use the Support Toolkit (STK) Admin tools » Reparse BBCode feature.

Before adding this MOD to your board, you should back up files and database first.', 'INSTALLER_INSTALL_END' => 'You should now login to your board and check if everything is working fine.
Do not forget to delete, rename or move this file! install_abbc3.php', // Stages 'INSTALLER_CONFIGS_ADD' => 'ABBC3 config', 'INSTALLER_BBCODES_ADD' => 'ABBC3 bbcodes',
